summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Instituto Jussara Kaisel portal with new mentoring functionalities. All backend endpoints working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend admin panel fully functional with edit/delete capabilities for mentoradas and financial records. Payment methods and scheduling integrations properly implemented.

design_issues.issue: Modal overlay occasionally intercepts clicks, requiring force=True in automation

passed_tests: PUT /api/users/{user_id} - Edit mentorada name and email
DELETE /api/users/{user_id} - Delete mentorada and cascade delete related data
DELETE /api/financeiro/{financeiro_id} - Delete financial record and parcelas
All 5 payment methods: Cartão de Crédito, Depósito Bancário, PIX, PayPal, Parcelamento Especial
Admin panel navigation between all tabs
Mentoradas tab with edit (pencil) and delete (trash) buttons
Financeiro tab with Novo Registro button and financial overview
Agendamentos integration with Calendly, YouCanBookMe, and Google Calendar configuration
Access control - mentorada users cannot access admin endpoints
Financial overview showing correct totals and progress bars
User creation, mentoria assignment, and financial record management workflow
